content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1717420688207{background: #141823 url(https://dreamstechnologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/titlebg.png?id=2402) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”tophdr pt-5 pb-5″][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Privacy Policy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Dreams Technologies is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring your personal information is handled safely and responsibly. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data, ensuring compliance with privacy standards and regulations.

Data Collection and Use
We collect personal information to provide you with a customized experience. This information may include personal details such as your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you choose to provide. We use this data for enhancing our services, responding to your inquiries, and keeping you informed about our latest updates and offerings. Our data collection practices adhere to strict privacy compliance standards, including GDPR compliance.

Third-Party Services
To enhance your experience, we may use third-party services that collect, monitor, and analyze data. These services are obligated to protect your information and use it solely for the purposes of providing their services to us, ensuring user data handling practices are secure.

Data Security
The security of your personal data is our foremost concern. We employ multiple security measures to safeguard your information. However, it’s important to note that no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage can guarantee 100% security.  We are committed to personal data security and take all necessary steps to protect confidential information.

Cookies and Tracking Technologies
We utilize cookies and similar tracking technologies to monitor activity on our website and store specific information. Cookies are small files of data that may include an anonymous unique identifier. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. Our privacy practices ensure that information collection is conducted transparently and securely.

User Rights
You are entitled to see your personal data, have it updated, or have it deleted.  If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us at business@dreamstechnologies.com.

We prioritize user privacy and ensure compliance with data privacy policy and regulations.

Changes to This Privacy Policy
We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. It is recommended to periodically review this Privacy Policy for any updates.

Contact Us

If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please reach out to us at:

Dreams Technologies
Email: business@dreamstechnologies.com
Phone: +91 9600008844

You agree to the collection and use of information as described in this policy by using our services. Thank you for trusting Dreams Technologies with your personal data.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
